page.title: 15A day at Kirby Hill School
page.content: After I have had my breakfast I leave home at about half past eight. It is playtime when I get to school until 8.45. We work until 10.40. When we start to work sometimes we do Music Workshop from the Radio or have assembly. Mr Hibbs tells us when it is playtime and when to come in again. We work until lunch time at 12.00. We come back from lunch and have a dinner playtime. We come back in and work or do handwork until 2.00. then we have a playtime and do Maths or Story. Then we go home at 3.00.
